drupalNodeEvent.title: Technical Standards: A New Realm of China’s International Influence?

field_speakers.processed: John Seaman (French Institute of International Relations-Ifri, Paris), Sarah Eaton (Humboldt University, Berlin), Daniel Fuchs (Humboldt University, Berlin), Juliette Genevaz (European Institute for Chinese Studies-EURICS, Paris and French Research Institute on East Asia-IFRAE, Inalco, Paris), Olivier Peyrat (AFNOR, Paris, CEN and ISO), Tim Rühlig (Swedish Institute of International Affairs)

field_description.processed: This round table will explore the role of technical standardization in China’s national industrial strategy and discuss efforts to deepen international cooperation on standards development at the bilateral and multilateral levels.
